sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: No respite in store for Europe, sweltering in record-breaking temperatures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: As one heatwave moves on, another is on the way, bringing possibly even higher temperatures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In Sardinia, there are fears that mercury could climb as high as 48 degrees centigrade, just slightly below the all-time European record of 48.8 degrees centigrade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In the Italian capital, Rome, records of 40 to 43 degrees are expected.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And alongside humans pets are also suffering.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some dog owners have brought them to the beach to enjoy the sea breeze.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In certain areas of Spain such as Malaga there is no escaping the heat even during the night.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At midnight it can be as hot as 36.1 degrees. Meanwhile in Turkey, the heat is making the battle with wildfire-sweeping Mughla province significantly more difficult.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At least one village in the region has been evacuated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian counteroffensive continues to advance slowly, with reports from military Українська військова оцінка продовжує поділятися медленні, зі свідомість від військових офіцій, що військові передбачені майже 2 км в тиждень у Мелітополі.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Український президент Зеленський визначив, що медленний продовжування відрізняє швидкість військових оцінок, які відбувалися в світі сильного російського опозиційного. strong Russian opposition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Belarusian state TV has published a video of Wagner Group mercenaries allegedly training Belarusian soldiers. Вместе с тем, Белорусская телевизия выпустила видео о мраконах Вагнера, которые, по-предсказуемому, тренируют белорусских солдат.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: США говорят, что вагнеры не борются в Украине anymore as a whole group, although many mercenaries have stayed in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Кремль говорит, что Россия не сделал никаких новых заявлений о границе с Турцией. The Kremlin says Russia has not made any new statements regarding the grain deal with Turkey.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Earlier, Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan said that there was a mutual understanding between him and Russian President Vladimir Putin about the prolongation of the grain deal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Western leaders have underlined the failure of the deal will have global consequences.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It is essential that we extend and expand the Black Sea Grain Initiative, which Russia is threatening to end once again on July 18.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: If Moscow follows through on its threat, developing countries, including in the region, will pay the price, including quite literally with higher food prices as well as greater food scarcity. quite literally with higher food prices as well as greater food scarcity." The deal allows Ukraine to ship more than 32 million tons of grain past Russian warships in the Black Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: No agreement could mean an increase in global food prices.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: India was the guest of honor at this year's Bastille Day celebrations in France.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: After watching the traditional military parade, Prime Minister Narendra Modi attended a dinner at the Louvre Museum hosted by President Macron and his wife.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Macron is keen on tightening alliances in the Indo-Pacific region against an increasingly assertive China.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Modi was awarded France's highest honour, the Légion d'honneur.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The two leaders also announced new initiatives to cooperate on renewable energy, hydrogen projects and artificial intelligence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It's official.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Netherlands will go to the polls on the 22nd of November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The country nearly always holds elections on Wednesdays. The early elections follow the collapse of the governing coalition. Among other issues, parties could not reach agreement over migration policies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Mark Rutte, the longest serving prime minister in Dutch history, has announced his ultimate retirement from politics and will not be standing in the elections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Some 500 people have been evacuated from the Spanish island of La Palma as a wildfire burned through 140 hectares of land. It's the worst natural disaster in the area since a volcanic eruption in 2021.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The blaze has already damaged at least 50 homes, according to authorities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Another 500 people could also be forced to evacuate in the coming hours, as the fire advances.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Some 150 firefighters have been deployed to help local crews battle the blaze.
